attributes.action: Petitions must carry boxes for signing agreement, abstention & disagreement.
attributes.background: I receive from time to time requests from change.org & Which, requests to support petitions. Some I sign because I agree with their campaign and some I do not sign. I agree with the ability of people to organise a petition but we should be allowed to register abstention & disagreement as well.

rejection.details:
This petition mentions change.org and Which. The Government and Parliament could not make changes to those petitions sites.

If you would like petition.parliament.uk to offer these options, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/115951
